user_query: I want to convert a text to speech. Please retrieve the audio file for the text-to-speech conversion with transaction ID 'xyz456'. Also, check if my email address is disposable or non-disposable. My email is 'example@gmail.com'.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the audio file using the provided transaction ID for text-to-speech conversion.
Check if the provided email address is disposable or non-disposable.
